评论概述: A Unique Piece Not For Everybody But If It's Your Style, Buy It
评论详情: I got this for my daughter and she's absolutely in love with it. She says it's extremely comfortable. It is thick enough that you can't see through the material which in and of itself is hard to find in women's clothing. However, it's not so thick that it's uncomfortable. It appears to be well made. The buttons are not too difficult. It does have buttons at the sleeves which you may need some help with depending on how your wrist bends. You can have the collar all the way up for a certain look but if you undo the top buttons you can sort of push the collar down and have it flare out for a whole different look. Quality material. Beautiful shirt. Pretty sure it's my daughter's favorite piece now. It's so good, we used them for her senior photos. I was hesitant about it because of the price but it was definitely worth it. It's understandably a unique style that isn't for everybody, but if you are considering this and wondering if it's worth it, it is.

I’m pleasantly surprised by how beautiful it fits, feels and looks. It worked great for my steampunk costume but I can also use it for the office. It really well made and the material is really nice on the skin. If you like more vintage looking blouses I definitely recommend this.

My daughter is very picky with clothes. Shopping takes forever and she rarely likes anything. Surprisingly she’s keeping this shirt. She says it fits good. So if you are looking for this style shirt, my ultra picky daughter approved.

From my 20 year-old daughter, whose wardrobe is mostly black and is almost completely characterized by Victorian, Goth, semi Steam-Punk styles, the shirt is great, the material nice. It’s not super thick but it’s not see through. It’s also stretchy enough to be comfortable. The buttons are pretty and have nice details. The collar isn’t too tight, and the sheer sleeves are a really cool touch. It’s definitely something I’ll wear more in the fall. I offer four stars because it it’s really sturdy and of good quality. The only issue is that the ruffles lay kind of weirdly and it’s a little awkward trying to get them to fall right.

it was comfortable in short periods but i my son got uncomfortable after a few hours so id recommend only wearing it for short periods of time such as an hour or two, it fit him perfectly and the ruffles stayed on great, my only concern is that the buttons seem flimsy and like they can break at any time.

I'm always dressing up for all kinds of things. This shirt is perfect for goth night or a Victorian vampire costume or any number of cool things.  The sleeves are a little sheer, but the shirt itself isn't too thin. The ruffles really add that old timey look, and the buttons are a nice touch.  I'm thinking of adding one of those corset belts to help cinch it in and show off my waist a little more. But you definitely don't need it. Just depends on the look you're going for.  If you want a unique costume shirt, this is perfect. Or you could just wear it as a regular top for a stand out look.
The style of this shirt is retro and classic, but the fabric is similar to chiffon, it is not particularly soft to wear, but the style is good.

评论概述: Medium weight, soft fabric…true to size
评论详情: The late music artist Prince came to mind when this ruffled shirt first arrived. It’s heavier than it looks and it’s very well made for a costume piece…except for the neck part. The stretchy fabric and ruffles do not stay straight/lined-up (see middle pic). The antique-like embossed buttons adds a nice touch and elevates the overall look.  It has a flattering, feminine fit…plus there’s ample room in the sleeves for ladies with larger arms. It’s very comfortable and soft against the skin. It’s true to size. For reference my bust is 41”(38D), my waist is 35”, and my upper arm circumference is 13.5”.  This shirt will look best with fitted pants/slacks, skinny jeans, a nice a-line skirt, straight skirt, simple pleated/accordion or pencil skirt. What a beautiful versatile find!
This blouse is beautiful! I ordered up a size and it still was kind of small. The material is stretchy however and the arms are chiffon. It's definitely giving Interview with a Vampire lol.

I am shocked and pleased by the level of detail in this blouse. The ruffles sit just like the product photo, but the shirt itself is a combination of design details and fabrics that make it have the movement and durability of an upscale brand. The torso is a soft, flexible fabric and the sleeves are roomy.

This is a very well-constructed shirt with quality material and tailoring. I normally order a larger size than what I did with this because the size chart specified larger measurements than what I normally see for clothing online. This shirt fits me just as I thought it would from those measurements listed. It looks great. The sleeves are somewhat opaque and the ruffles are fantastically frilly.  This is a really good shirt for both period costumes or an everyday statement shirt if you are so inclined to make it your style.

评论概述: Lovely Details, Including Sheer Sleeves. Goth Staple. Top Button Is Askew.
评论详情: For reference, I’m an eccentric Goth that typically wears a teen size S or XS and a 32B bra, I’m 5’4, 115 pounds, and I have the Theatrical Romantic Kibbe body type. I ordered this blouse in a size XS in the color “Black.” Despite being an XS, this top still fits pretty loosely on me, which is fine, since it will always be tucked in, and the length reaches just below the top of my butt. The wrist cuffs fit loosely enough to easily adjust, and I retain full mobility of my arms. While the bodice material is thick enough to not be see-through, the sleeves certainly are, and intentionally so, which is a lovely aesthetic detail. The material also holds wrinkles, so you’ll likely want to iron those out. The pretty ruffles at the collar and sleeves add some substantial weight to this attractive blouse, which I really like. The buttons are plastic, but they still look very special. They’re a tarnished silver color with a crown design embossed in the center. Unfortunately, the stitching of the button holes is a bit messy, so buttons often get stuck on loose threads inside those holes. Otherwise, the stitching of this blouse seems very nice. My only serious gripe about this top is that the very top button is sewn farther inward than the buttons below it, so when this is completely buttoned up, that top button is positioned askew from the neat line of buttons below it. So, I’ll be re-sewing that button to sit more appropriately. Aesthetically, this is a perfect top for any goth who is into period, romantic, or vampyric looks, and it should be considered a wardrobe staple.

This shirt fits like it was made for me. The fabric is soft yet thick...high quality. The ruffles are absolutely stunning and I want more like this shirt. It can work as goth, under a suit, with casual pants...it's just a really nice shirt.

评论概述: Womens Victorian Vintage Long Sleeve Shirt
评论详情: This is a nice Women's Victorian Vintage Long Sleeve Shirt. I love the material. It feels and looks very good. Fit is great and comfortable. It runs true to size.

I love the fashion statement this blouse makes. The detail throughout the blouse with its ruffles is simple gorgeous. The material is soft and slightly sheer but still classy.  The color is vivid and bright. Perfect to pair with riding pants, and/or a great pencil skirt.

She ordered the Large, and Amazon's Size-Bot said the Large would fit her, but she wasn't sure because the Size chart said a Medium with a 40.15 bust might fit (40+bust, petite body). The Large fits better than she had hoped -- it's loose, but not too loose, and the Medium would have been snug across the bust and belly. The sleeves are a bit long, but then MOST sleeves are a bit long for her. She'll have to move the sleeve buttons to keep the sleeve from dropping over her hand (but, again, many long-sleeve shirts need the buttons moved to tighten the sleeve cuff). (So, maybe, since the Large fits so well, but from the numbers on the size chart, should be loose on her, MAYBE the shirt runs a little smaller than the size chart would suggest?) The see-through sleeves are nicely done, just enough opaque to be "intriguing" and the back is slightly more opaque (but still see-through enough that she'll probably plan on wearing a camisole under it or a jacket over it). The front of the bust is nicely covered with the ruffle trim from the collar going down and completely covering the bust area. The stand-up collar and wrist-cuffs look authentically Victorian Era, and this blouse could easily be part of a Victorian costume! She LIKES it!

评论概述: Runs Very Small, Looks A Bit Cheap
评论详情: I double-checked to make sure I was sent a medium and that's what it's labeled as but the measurements are smaller than is listed on the chart for size small, with an actual 35.5" bust. The material is however, super stretchy, which I wasn't expecting, so I guess I can just sew up where the buttons are in the middle and pull the shirt on and off without them, because I have major gapping given that I was expecting a 40" bust shirt. It's see-through enough in the main body that you'll need a nude bra, with the sleeves and part of the side being totally transparent. Even without the size issue, I think this is a bit overpriced as it looks quite costume-y, but maybe it looks a bit better in the black color.

I absolutely love this blouse! It looks exactly like the one in the pictures. The small is a beautiful fit on me, and it is so soft! It's easy to clean and hang out to dry, which is amazing. It is so stunning and I have found beautiful pieces to go along with.

This is definitely a great costume shirt for a Victorian costume. The ruffles are kind of extreme at the neck, and I love that!  It arrived wrinkled, but it went through the washer and dryer well, and that took out most of the wrinkles.  I do feel the fabric (except for the ruffles) is slightly more cream-colored than I expected.

Honestly was expecting this to be cheap or too small but it surprised me! It fits rather well and feels like decent enough material! The buttons are very loose though, so those need to be reenforced but it’s still a very good shirt! Would work for goth babes or cosplay!

评论概述: Perfect for a variety of costumes
评论详情: This is exactly what I was looking for! This is perfect for a variety of costumes and looks.  It feels great, has a great fitted cut and coordinates well with a variety of bottoms. With a bit of care, it should hold up well.
